description:
Leading in-memory database vendor Redis is adopting a dual-licensing model, imposing far stricter terms on companies offering Redis as a service.  In an official announcement, Redis Labs stated that starting with version 7.4, Redis will be dual-licensed under the Redis Source Available License (RSALv2) and the controversial Server Side Public License (SSPLv1). This is not... Read more »

The post Redis switches to more restrictive license appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Redis switches to more restrictive license
